features: 【Microphone Featuring】1. Wireless dual lavalier mic with usb-c port, widely compatible all smartphones and tables with type c port; 2. Highly sensitive to automatically pair your phones with usbc bluetooth receiver; 3. wireless microphones with a stable connection distance of up to 65 Feet; 4. Plug-Play Clip on Lapel Mic for social media and videos.

【Full Compatibility Lav Mics 】USBC type mini mic is widely compatible with all USB-C devices, for Apple iPhone 15/15 Pro/15 Pro Max/15 Plus, iPad, Android Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 5G/S23 Plus/S23/S22 Ultra 5G/S22 Plus/S21+/S21 Ultra/S20 FE, Galaxy A14 5G/A13, Google Pixel 8 Pro/8/8a/7 Pro/7/7a/6 Pro/6/6a/5/5a/4a/4 xl, Moto, LG, HTC, ZTE, HONOR, more smart phones and tablets with USB C port.

【Best Audio Quality Mics】The microphone for iphone 15/Android provide stable transmission within 65 feet without obstacles. Build in upgraded noise reduction chip to ensure the cleanest sound experience possible.

【One Key Automatic Pairing】 Plug-Play Clip On Mic, Simply plug mic receiver to your android or iphone 15, and click on wireless mics they will automatically power on and connect to your phones. Enabling one-tap functionality for Video Recording, Interview Podcasting, Game Live Streaming, Vlogging, YouTube, Tiktok, facebook live.

【Bordsek Wireless Mic Service Guarantee】If you have any dissatisfaction with the wireless Bluetooth micro phones kit, we can offer you 1-year payment refund/replacement guarantee, we guarantee a 100% return, and give you a full refund. Sincerely wish you a happy shopping!
body.description: - wireless Microphone specification - - Product Type: Wireless Bluetooth Microphones; - Bluetooth technology: Bluetooth V5.3; - Working time: >4 hours; - Charging time: 1 hour; - Audio Receiver distance: barrier-free 65FT; - Microphone battery capacity: 60 amp; - signal-to-noise ratio: 95db; - Active noise reduction - Easy to carry - Packaging size: 12.1*8.1*3.1cm - Microphone Featuring - - stable connection distance - - wireless microphones with a stable connection distance of up to 65 FT, freely moving between the phone and the mics. - Upgraded Bluetooth 5.3 - - The Bluetooth microphones are equipped with the comprehensive upgrade Bluetooth 5.3 chip, only need 1 seconds to Pair. - Tight connect on your lavalier - - Only 0.23oz lightweight to ensure feeless wearing a lapel microphone with tight clip . - package content - - 2* Wireless mic transmitters with Usb C Charging Port; - 1* Microphone receiver with USB-C Port; - 1* usb c cable for Lav Mics; - 12 month hassle free warranty.

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Super easy to use and a clear sound when using for videos. This worked perfectly for my iPhone 15 pro and the sound quality picked up small noises with ease. A great product for making content videos or just goofing around. Highly recommend this!
